parameters.content:
## Get all UpWork job listings from Airtable database 
This node retrieves all saved UpWork job listings stored in a specified Airtable table. It performs a "getAll" operation to fetch all rows from the

## New listings response
If new listings are found this responses with a link to the airtable where the new listing are saved. 

There you can review the listings and select the ones you want to apply. That will trigger part of this flow

## Merge data and keep unique job listing
This node merges and filters the extracted job listing links, ensuring that only unique UpWork job listing URLs are processed. It prevents duplicate listings from being handled.

## Setup
1. **Connect to Airtable**: Ensure your Airtable account is connected and the necessary table for job listings is set up.

2. **Configure APIFY**: Get your APIFY API key and create your credential.

3. **Deploy Web Form**: Implement the form to capture job search criteria from users.

4. **Set Up Webhook**: Configure webhooks for serving the webpage and handling responses.

## Tools That Are Interchangeable















`Airtable` can be swapped with another service like `Google Sheets` or `NocoDB`

## What this workflow does
1. **Scrapes Upwork** for jobs based on the criteria completed in the trigger form.

2. **Retrieve and Filter Job Listings**: The workflow checks Airtable for existing listings to avoid duplicates.

3. **Writes the listing to an Airtable**: So the listings can be reviewed and suitable listings selected to ctead application with AI in part of the flow.

4. **Airtable is used to check for duplicate listings**: Only unique listings are written to the Airtable.

5. **Serve Webpage with Application Details**: A webpage is served displaying either a success notice if new listings are found, or an error notice that there are no new listings since your last search.

6. **Update Airtable with new listings**: Only new listings are written to the airtable.

## Automate UpWork Job Applications with AI
Built for the [**Let's Automate It Community**](https://letsautomateit.biz/community/) by [Robin Tindall](https://za.linkedin.com/in/robin-tindall) & [Darryn Balanco](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/darrynbalanco)

This workflow streamlines the process of managing UpWork job applications by integrating Airtable for data storage and an AI model for generating cover letters. By automating these tasks, it enhances efficiency and consistency in job applications.

## Part 1 of The Upwork Application Workflow
`Part 1` scrapes upwork for jobs with a particular keyword and location. If a new job listing is found it added to an airtable.

### **Create Personal Access Token:**
Personal access tokens grant permission to read and write data via the Airtable API.
[https://airtable.com/create/tokens](https://airtable.com/create/tokens)

### **Register an OAuth integration:**
OAuth integrations let users grant your service or application API access to their Airtable data.
[https://airtable.com/create/oauth](https://airtable.com/create/oauth)

## n8n Form Trigger
Complete the form to search Upwork for jobs suited to you

parameters.formDescription:
Search Upwork for Job Listings.

Recommendation: Do a test search on Upwork first to find search criteria that return good results.

Set Max results to smaller rather than a larger number to control your APIFY scarping costs. We recommend between 5 and 10 results.

Below is a list of regions or countries you can use to narrow your search. Leave blank for a global search. 

Regions:
Africa Americas Antarctica Asia Europe Oceania Subregions Australia and New Zealand Caribbean Central America Central Asia Eastern Africa Eastern Asia Eastern Europe Melanesia Micronesia Middle Africa Northern Africa Northern America Northern Europe Polynesia South America South-Eastern Asia Southern Africa Southern Asia Southern Europe Western Africa Western Asia Western Europe

parameters.content:
## Trigger Apify Scrape
Apify.com is a market of "actors" or "scrapers". This node starts an Upwork Scraper that will search for jobs based on the criteria supplied in the trigger form and return any suitable jobs found
## Sets the results of the Apify Scrape

## No new jobs found
If no new jobs are found since the last search then this responds

value.Search term: ={{ $('Merge data and keep unique results').item.json['Search term'] }}
